subject: Re: Parrot at YAPC::NA::2007 in Houston
body:
James E Keenan wrote:
> See below for the schedule of Perl 6 and Parrot-related talks at YAPC in 
> 2 weeks.
> 
> Will there be a time for a Parrot BOF there?

Looks like Monday, June 25, 5:00 pm will be a good time for most all 
concerned.

Find out more about the Parrot BOF at this page on the conference wiki:
http://conferences.mongueurs.net/yn2007/wiki?node=Parrot%20BOF

kid51
